mapper.select: select * from BOARD_COMMENT where BOARD_INDEX = #{board_index} order by COMMENT_INDEX desc
mapper.insert: insert into BOARD_COMMENT values(COMMENT_INDEX_SEQ.nextval, #{board_index}, #{member_name}, #{member_email}, #{comment_content}, SYSDATE, null)
mapper.update: update BOARD_COMMENT set comment_content = #{comment_content} where comment_index = ${comment_index}
